com.intel.fightclub.dialog.tips

Class TipsGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.fightclub.dialog.tips.TipsGenerator

  • @NotThreadSafe
public final class TipsGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of the tip generator. Tips are randomly generated according to the following rules: All tips have a unique commentCode that can be used to keep track of which have already been used. If multiple tips happen to have the same commentCode, once one of them has been used, they all get marked used and none will be reused until all tips from the workout type have been used up. Tips are grouped by workout type and within workout type by priority. Tips can also belong to the workout type "All" which means they can be given out for any type of workout. When a tip is requested, they're handed out in priority order (lowest numbers first) Within the same priority, workout type specific tips are given out first, then "All" type tips. Within the same priority, tips are shuffled first so that they're given out in random order. When all of the tips at one priority have been used, then tips from the next priority are used and so on. When all tips have been used up in any workout type, then they're reset and used again. Tips marked "onlyUseOnce" are not reset and are only ever given out once.

    • Method Detail

      • generateTip

        @NonNull
public Tip generateTip(@NonNull
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> variableMap)
                         throws com.intel.ndg.sdi.cap.dlg.common.uttgen.api.exception.UtteranceGenerationException
        Generates a random Tip in priority order, only reusing tips once all have been handed out.
        Parameters:
        variableMap - A variable map which might contain workout type information.
        Returns:
        A random Tip in priority order that matches the given workout type.
        Throws:
        com.intel.ndg.sdi.cap.dlg.common.uttgen.api.exception.UtteranceGenerationException - an exception might be thrown if no tips are in the database or there are no tips suitable for the given workout type.

      • createTipsGenerator

        @Nullable
public static TipsGenerator createTipsGenerator(@NonNull
                                                          java.io.InputStream databaseInputStream,
                                                          @NonNull
                                                          com.intel.ndg.sdi.cap.content.ContentStore contentStore)
        Reads a tip database into a map. The tip database is just a single section of "tip" utterances. The input stream is then closed by this method.
        Parameters:
        databaseInputStream - The input tip database.
        contentStore - Content store where tip usage history is stored.
        Returns:
        A map with prompt id as keys and a list of tip entries for each key.
